weather_report:
As the evening settles into Boston, a comforting calm blankets the city, punctuated only by the whisper of patchy fog that stirs after midnight. The skies, draped in a mostly cloudy veil, suggest a warm night ahead with temperatures hovering around 68 degrees, inviting residents to step outside and breathe in the gentle warmth. A soft southwest breeze carries a hint of adventure, rustling through trees and cooling the air just enough to remind one of the summer’s slow embrace.

Tomorrow, the dawn will break with an ethereal touch of fog, dissipating before the sun asserts its presence. The atmosphere promises a striking contrast as the day unfolds; expect a vibrant and sunny expanse, graced with heat that will ripple the air and conjure a heat index nudging 102 degrees. The brisk gusts will come alive, a reminder that under this sweltering sun, nature’s breath is ever-present. Dressing for such a day calls for light, airy fabrics that allow for movement and comfort, perhaps a short-sleeved shirt paired with breathable shorts to navigate the heat. Venture outdoors for an afternoon stroll along the esplanade or perhaps enjoy a leisurely iced coffee at a quaint café, savoring the sun-drenched moments of a day that hints at both relaxation and the warmth of community.
